00051 /*! This class is used for writing CHP files. */
00052 class CCHPFileWriter : public affxchp::CCHPFileData
00053 {
00054 public:
00055         /*! Constructor */
00056         CCHPFileWriter();
00057 
00058         /*! Destructor */
00059         ~CCHPFileWriter();
00060 
00061 protected:
00062         /*! The output file stream object */
00063         std::ofstream m_NewChpFile;
00064 
00065         /*! A flag to indicate the first entry is being saved. */
00066         int m_ProbeSetIndex;
00067 
00068 public:
00069         /*! Creates the new file (empty) given the file name.
00070          * @return True if successful
00071          */
00072         bool CreateNewFile();
00073 
00074         /*! Allocates memory for the results objects and prepares the object for writing.
00075          * @param cdf The associated CDF file.
00076          * @param allocateMemory Allocates memory for the results.
00077          */
00078         void InitializeForWriting(affxcdf::CCDFFileData &cdf, bool allocateMemory=true);
00079 
00080         /*! Allocates memory for the results objects and prepares the object for writing.
00081          * @param numRows The number of rows of features on the array.
00082          * @param numCols The number of columns of features on the array.
00083          * @param numProbeSets The number of probe sets.
00084          * @param chipType The chip type or probe array type.
00085          * @param probeSetType The type of probe sets in the file.
00086          * @param allocateMemory Allocates memory for the results.
00087          */
00088         void InitializeForWriting(int numRows, int numCols, int numProbeSets, const char *chipType, affxcdf::GeneChipProbeSetType probeSetType, bool allocateMemory=true);
00089 
00090         /*! Sets the parent CEL file name.
00091          * @param str The parent CEL file name (full path).
00092          */
00093         void SetParentCelFileName(const char *str);
00094 
00095         /*! Sets the prog ID of the algorithm used to create the CHP file data.
00096          * @param str The prog ID.
00097          */
00098         void SetProgID(const char *str);
00099 
00100         /*! Sets the algorithm name used to create the CHP file data.
00101          * @param str The name of the algorithm.
00102          */
00103         void SetAlgorithmName(const char *str);
00104 
00105         /*! Sets the algorithm version used to create the CHP file data.
00106          * @param str The algorithm version.
00107          */
00108         void SetAlgorithmVersion(const char *str);
00109 
00110         /*! Adds a parameter name/value pair to the list of algorithm parameters
00111          * @param tag The name of the parameter
00112          * @param value The value of the parameter
00113          */
00114         void AddAlgorithmParameter(const char *tag, const char *value);
00115 
00116         /*! Adds a parameter name/value pair to the list of summary parameters
00117          * @param tag The name of the parameter
00118          * @param value The value of the parameter
00119          */
00120         void AddChipSummaryParameter(const char *tag, const char *value);
00121 
00122         /*! Sets the expression probe set result
00123          * @param index The index to the probe set results
00124          * @param pEntry A pointer to the results
00125          */
00126         void SetExpressionEntry(int index, affxchp::CExpressionProbeSetResults *pEntry);
00127

00129          * @param pEntry A pointer to the results.
00130          */
00131         bool SaveExpressionEntry(affxchp::CExpressionProbeSetResults *pEntry);

00137         void SetMappingEntry(int index, affxchp::CGenotypeProbeSetResults *pEntry);

00148         void SetUniversalEntry(int index, affxchp::CUniversalProbeSetResults *pEntry);
00149

00153         bool SaveUniversalEntry(affxchp::CUniversalProbeSetResults *pEntry);
00154 
00155         /*! Sets the resequencing results
00156          * @param pResults A pointer to the results
00157          */
00158         void SetResequencingResults(affxchp::CResequencingResults *pResults);
00159 
00160         /*! Saves the results to the file.
00161          * @return True if successful
00162          */
00163         bool Save();
00164

00166          * @return True if successful
00167          */
00168         bool SaveHeader();
00169 
00170         /*! Closes the file.
00171          * @return True if successful */
00172         bool Close();
00173 
00174         /*! Initializes the object which stores the background zone information
00175          * @param nZones The number of zones
00176          * @param smoothFactor The smooth factor used by the background algorithm.
00177          */
00178         void AddBackgroundInfo(int nZones, float smoothFactor);
00179 
00180         /*! Adds a background zone to the list
00181          * @param x The central x coordinate of the background zone.
00182          * @param y The central y coordinate of the background zone.
00183          * @param value The background value for the zone.
00184          */
00185         void AddBackgroundZone(int x, int y, float value);
